Flow.label: Unsubscribe Link Setup

fields.name: FinalOrgName
fields.fieldText: What is your organization or company name?

fields.name: DonedisplayText
fields.fieldText: You are done!

fields.name: confirmationEmailDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
PREVIEW

The email recipient receives an email.

{!horizontalLine1}


From: {!varT_OrgWideEmailDisplayName}

Email body: {!ConfirmEmailText}

fields.name: displayPublicIds
fields.fieldText:
Great! That part is done.


Last step

The Unsubscribe Link uses a 64 digit random id on each contact and lead, called Public_Id__c.

This may take a little while. You will receive an email when it is done.

After this, two record triggered flows will automatically create public ids when new contacts and leads are created.


Click next to populate the public ids on all your records now.

screens.description: A preview of the email with the option to modify the text of the link
screens.name: EmailModifyScreen
screens.label: Screen Email Preview

fields.name: SampleEmailDisplayText_0
fields.fieldText:
ï»¿PREVIEW

Your email recipient gets an email like this with an unsubscribe link at the bottom.

{!horizontalLine1}


Dear Friend,


It's Thursday! You love to order a pizza on Thursdays! If you order before 5, I'll also throw in some free drinks!


Your friend,

Bob


{!var_FinalRecord.Link_Text__c}

fields.name: Screen1PreviewDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
PREVIEW

This page allows the recipient to confirm before opting out.

{!horizontalLine1}


{!var_FinalRecord.Screen_1_Part_1__c} georgeB@bbbl.org {!var_FinalRecord.Screen_1_Part_2__c}

fields.name: googlewarning
fields.fieldText:
{!horizontalLine1}

Gmail wants you to make it easier to unsubscribe with "one click" email opt-out so we advise against adding in this page.

screens.description: Select informations to set up the unsubscribe link
screens.name: Set_Up_Unsubscribe_Link_0
screens.label: InitialSetUp

fields.name: Company_Name
fields.fieldText: Company Name

fields.name: confirmEmailQ
fields.fieldText: Do you want to send a confirmation email immediately after the email recipient opts out?

fields.name: ConfirmEmailText
fields.fieldText: What should the email say?
fields.helpText: Example text: You have successfully unsubscribed from all email from <insert company name>.

fields.name: OrgWideEmailQ
fields.fieldText: Choose the organization wide email address that this email will appear to be from.

fields.name: orgwideEmailMoreInfo
fields.fieldText: Here's how to set up an org wide email address.

fields.name: OneClickdisplaytext
fields.fieldText:
{!horizontalLine1}

The unsubscribe link passes the contact or lead's Salesforce id to a flow. Sometimes an email recipient's security settings block or scramble the ID. You can allow your recipients to type in their email addresses to unsubscribe in that situation. BE CAREFUL! This allows anyone who has the link and knows any email addresses in your database to unsubscribe them. For example, if a bad guy knows that joeschmoe@ymail.com loves your newsletters and that bad guy dislikes your organization, then he could potentially unsubscribe Joe Schmoe from your newsletter!

fields.name: type_in_unsubscribe
fields.fieldText: Allow recipient to type in email

fields.name: GetReadytoPreviewDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
{!horizontalLine1}

Click Preview to see the unsubscribe process from the email recipient's perspective.

textTemplates.name: txt_Screen3
textTemplates.text: To unsubscribe from all email from {!var_FinalRecord.Our_Organization__c}, enter your email address and click NEXT.
